summary: Powerfull Daedric follower with a powerfull weapon....
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Powerfull Daedric follower to the game, underneath the armor it\'s just a sneaky arganon :D
You can give him your own weapons and spells! 
========================================================================================
Follower located at Alvor and Sigred\'s house in Riverwood.
========================================================================================
IF U HAVE ANY IDEA\'S LET ME KNOW!!!!!!!
========================================================================================
If there are any problems, feel free to report them to me.
========================================================================================
How to install:

Download the .esp and place it in your data folder....
author: G0Dx
